customer_notification.subject: Refund Processed: UETR 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
customer_notification.body:
Dear Alice Smith,

This email provides an update regarding the investigation into your recent payment refund.

The details of the refund investigation are as follows:

*   **UETR:** 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
*   **Return Amount:** USD 1000.0
*   **Return Reason:** Return due to invalid account (AC01)
*   **FX Loss:** AUD 0.00
*   **Status:** Refund Processed

**Action Required:**
No action required. Your refund has been processed successfully.

Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Sincerely,

CBA Refund Investigations Team
customer_notification.html_body:
Dear Alice Smith,

This email provides an update regarding the investigation into your recent payment refund.

The details of the refund investigation are as follows:

  • UETR: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
  • Return Amount: USD 1000.0
  • Return Reason: Return due to invalid account (AC01)
  • FX Loss: AUD 0.00
  • Status: Refund Processed
No action required. Your refund has been processed successfully.
Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Sincerely,

CBA Refund Investigations Team
